channel.title: Posts on Posei
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Posei

item.title: Let's start with circles
item.description: Circles! Well, tbh it’s quite a stretch to call these circles, it’s a bunch of deformed eggs at best. However, I now somehwat know that I have a lot to work on, a bit daunting but I have a clear path. I’ll continue to draw more circles for the next couple of days until I get the hang of it, then I’ll move on.
item.dc:creator: Posei

item.title: Auspicious Start
item.description: Failed Attemps I’ve been wanting to start learning how to draw for quite some time now but for some reason I always ended up dropping it, probably commitment issues xd. Well, whatever the reasons are I would like to try again and I think this time I’ve set up measures to minimize failure, this site is one of said measure. Futhermore, this time I have a clear actionable goal in mind
item.dc:creator: Posei
